title: Duckhorn Portfolio Tasting
description:
Duckhorn Portfolio Tasting at Whispering Vine – Fourth Street

Join us on Saturday, September 20, from 1–3 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth Street for an exclusive tasting showcasing the prestigious Duckhorn Portfolio, including rare selections from Kosta Browne, Goldeneye, and more. This lineup represents the pinnacle of craftsmanship, with wines that retail collectively at nearly $950—yet available to taste for just a fraction of that value.

Tasting Fee: $95 (tax & tip included, passed flatbread included)

Reserve your Spot

Featured Wines:

• Kosta Browne Barrel Auction Pinot Noir 2021 – Extremely limited, only 120 bottles produced – Plush and textured with cherry liqueur, candied flowers, pie spice, and supple tannins.

• Kosta Browne Gevrey-Chambertin 2020 – 93 pts James Suckling, 93 pts Decanter – Focused and elegant with saturated dark fruit, spice, and firm yet polished tannins.

• Duckhorn Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Voluptuous and complex with blackberry, blueberry cobbler, chocolate, and refined tannins.

• Goldeneye Anderson Valley Pinot Noir 2022 – 92 pts James Suckling – Silky and balanced with ripe cherry, blackberry, and refreshing acidity.

…and more selections from Paraduxx, Canvasback, Decoy, Calera, and Sonoma-Cutrer.
